data.name: Darkhawk
data.description: After finding an alien amulet, Chris Powell joins the fight as the android Darkhawk, generating energy for his allies and slowing his enemies.

starItems.name: Darkhawk
starItems.description: After finding an alien amulet, Chris Powell joins the fight as the android Darkhawk, generating energy for his allies and slowing his enemies.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> to primary and adjacent targets

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>

3.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
This attack has +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Extra Crit Chance

4.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

This attack has +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Extra Crit Chance.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

5.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

This attack has +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Extra Crit Chance.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
+<color=#86e619>15%</color> Extra Crit Chance

6.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

This attack has +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Extra Crit Chance.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to primary and adjacent targets

7.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>310%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

This attack has +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Extra Crit Chance.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and adjacent <color=#fff568>TECH</color> allies.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and adjacent <color=#fff568>TECH</color> allies.
2.nextUpgrade:
Spread <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, from the primary target to all adjacent enemies
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

3.description:
Spread <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, from the primary target to all adjacent enemies.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and adjacent <color=#fff568>TECH</color> allies.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

4.description:
Spread <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, from the primary target to all adjacent enemies.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and adjacent <color=#fff568>TECH</color> allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
Spread <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects from the primary target to adjacent enemies
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

5.description:
Spread <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, from the primary target to all adjacent enemies.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and adjacent <color=#fff568>TECH</color> allies.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies

6.description:
Spread <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, from the primary target to all adjacent enemies.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and adjacent <color=#fff568>TECH</color> allies.
6.nextUpgrade:
Spread all negative effects from the primary target to adjacent enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and adjacent <color=#fff568>TECH</color> allies

7.description:
Spread all negative effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, from the primary target to all adjacent enemies.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and adjacent <color=#fff568>TECH</color> allies.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all allies.

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all allies.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, fill Speed Bar for this character and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies by <color=#86e619>5%</color>

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, fill Speed Bar for this character and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all allies.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>45%</color> damage to all enemies
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, reduce Speed Bar for all enemies by <color=#86e619>5%</color>

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>225%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > Reduce Speed Bar for all enemies by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.
 > Fill Speed Bar for this character and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, fill Speed Bar for this character and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies by <color=#86e619>5%</color> per <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> ally

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>275%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > Reduce Speed Bar for all enemies by <color=#86e619>5%</color>.
 > Fill Speed Bar for this character and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies by <color=#86e619>5%</color> + <color=#86e619>5%</color> per <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> ally.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>65%</color> damage to all enemies
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, reduce Speed Bar for all enemies by <color=#86e619>5%</color> per <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> ally

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>340%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > Reduce Speed Bar for all enemies by <color=#86e619>5%</color> + <color=#86e619>5%</color> per <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> ally.
 > Fill Speed Bar for this character and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies by <color=#86e619>5%</color> + <color=#86e619>5%</color> per <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> ally.
6.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage per <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> on this character
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies

7.description:
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage per <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> on this character.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>340%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > Reduce Speed Bar for all enemies by <color=#86e619>5%</color> + <color=#86e619>5%</color> per <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> ally.
 > Fill Speed Bar for this character and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies by <color=#86e619>5%</color> + <color=#86e619>5%</color> per <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> ally.

1.description: On self or ally Crit, heal self for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.
1.nextUpgrade:
<color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance.
<color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Crit Damage

2.description:
On self or ally Crit, heal self for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

<color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance.
<color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Crit Damage.
2.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, lower the Crit Chance of enemies with <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color> by <color=#86e619>30%</color>
When this character or a <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> ally uses their Basic Ability, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for this character and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies

3.description:
On self or ally Crit, heal self for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When this character or a <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> ally uses their Basic Ability, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for this character and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies.

<color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance.
<color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Crit Damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Lower the Crit Chance of enemies with <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color> by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance per <color=#fff568>TECH</color> ally
<color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance

4.description:
On self or ally Crit, heal self for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When this character or a <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> ally uses their Basic Ability, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for this character and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance per <color=#fff568>TECH</color> ally.
<color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Crit Chance.
<color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Crit Damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Lower the Crit Chance of enemies with <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color> by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Crit Damage
<color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Crit Damage

5.description:
On self or ally Crit, heal self for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When this character or a <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> ally uses their Basic Ability, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for this character and all <color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance per <color=#fff568>TECH</color> ally.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Crit Damage.
<color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Crit Chance.
<color=#fff568>P.E.G.A.S.U.S.</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Crit Damage.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Lower the Crit Chance of enemies with <color=#9055FF>Vulnerable</color> by <color=#86e619>30%</color>.
